lesson.title: Introduction to Offline Web Apps
lesson.content: In this lesson, you will learn how PWAs work without internet. We'll cover service workers, cache strategies, and background sync.

lesson.title: Mastering Database Migrations
lesson.content: Learn how Prisma keeps your database in sync across the team. Understand migration files, rollback strategies, and production deployment.

lesson.title: Building Resilient APIs
lesson.content: Design APIs that handle failures gracefully. Learn about retry logic, circuit breakers, and error handling patterns.

lesson.title: Understanding Database Indexes
lesson.content: Master the art of database optimization with indexes. Learn when to add indexes, composite indexes, and how to analyze query performance.

lesson.title: Transaction Management in PostgreSQL
lesson.content: Explore ACID properties, isolation levels, and transaction patterns. Learn how to prevent race conditions and ensure data integrity.

lesson.title: Progressive Web App Fundamentals
lesson.content: Build web applications that work offline and feel native. Learn about manifest files, app icons, and installation prompts.

lesson.title: Advanced Prisma Queries
lesson.content: Level up your Prisma skills with complex queries, aggregations, and raw SQL. Optimize your data fetching patterns.

lesson.title: Authentication and Authorization
lesson.content: Implement secure authentication flows with JWT, sessions, and OAuth. Learn best practices for password hashing and token management.

lesson.title: Caching Strategies with Redis
lesson.content: Improve application performance with Redis caching. Learn cache invalidation strategies, TTL management, and cache warming.

lesson.title: Deployment and DevOps Basics
lesson.content: Deploy your application to production with confidence. Learn about Docker, CI/CD pipelines, environment variables, and monitoring.
